definition: to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

sentences.english: Newcomers include Japanese knotweed and Amur bush honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 外来物种包括日本紫菀和灌木忍冬。

sentences.english: Studies of blue honeysuckle(Lonicera caerulea L. ) were briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 简述了蓝靛果忍冬种质资源的研究进展。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To gain a clear idea on the resources of the medicinal plants of Lonicera L. (Caprifoliaceae) in Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查四川忍冬属药用植物的资源状况。

sentences.english: Hummingbirds were stopping over honeysuckles flowers.
Having leaped from green spring, sad autumn and ruthless winter to next greener summer.
sentences.chinese: 跳过绿春悲秋忍冬和来年更加青绿的夏天。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION This compound is firstly obtained from the genus Lonicera.
sentences.chinese: 结论该化合物为首次从忍冬属植物中分离得到。

sentences.english: Fruit anatomy of Lonicera edulis and its taxonomic significance.
sentences.chinese: 兰靛果忍冬的果实解剖及其分类意义。

sentences.english: The study on the stem secondary xylem of Lonicera maximowiczii, reveals the wood belongs to ring porous wood.
sentences.chinese: 研究紫枝忍冬茎次生木质部结构，其为环孔材。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To gain a cleat-idea on the resources of the medicinal plants of Lonicera L. (Caprifoliaceae) in Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查四川忍冬属药用植物的资源状况。

sentences.english: Wang Yao is anxious to find out the honeysuckle lumbago again.
sentences.chinese: 王耀急着想出门找忍冬，结果腰痛的老毛病又犯了。

sentences.english: It carries the scent of honeysuckle, sweet as the lover's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 吐息轻携着忍冬的芬芳，香若爱侣的蜜吻。

sentences.english: The honeysuckle rambled all over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 忍冬属植物爬满了篱笆。

sentences.english: Lonicera edulis is the plant of Caprifoliaceae.
Once more he saw open honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次看到了盛开的忍冬花。

sentences.english: To utilize the stem of Lonicera japonica Thunb in effect, and establish the determination method.
sentences.chinese: 综合利用忍冬藤，建立对其中绿原酸含量的测定方法。

definition: common mallow (Malva sinesis), used in TCM
Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
